backend/main.mo: Motoko canister defining category, worker, and inquiry types with access control, approval flow, and in-memory maps for storing all entities.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping feature IDs to affected frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file listing short descriptions of many frontend source files for reference.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining light and dark theme variables and applying base styles.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React router setup defining all app routes and global providers like Theme and I18n.
frontend/src/components/admin/Categories: Admin UI for listing, creating, editing, and deleting service categories using React Query mutations.
frontend/src/components/admin/InquiriesA: Admin panel for viewing, filtering, updating, and deleting inquiries with error handling and status management.
frontend/src/components/admin/WorkersAdm: Admin panel to approve, reject, publish, remove, or update worker categories, using dialogs and query hooks.
frontend/src/components/alarms/PostCallA: Mount-level component that checks for and triggers post-call alarms, rendering the alarm modal when needed.
Modal that plays an alarm sound, blocks dismissal via escape or outside clicks, and prompts the user to acknowledge a service reminder.
frontend/src/components/alarms/useAlarmS: Hook that plays an alarm sound for a fixed duration and handles autoplay issues and cleanup.
frontend/src/components/auth/InternetIde: Displays an error notice for Internet Identity login failures with troubleshooting steps and a retry button.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button handling Internet Identity authentication, status logging, retries, and error display.
frontend/src/components/Brand.tsx: Simple component displaying the SevaSangam brand name in English, Hindi, and Assamese.
frontend/src/components/categories/Categ: Renders a grid of category cards linking to category pages with images and names.
frontend/src/components/errors/Connectio: Shows a connection error alert with troubleshooting tips and a retry option.
frontend/src/components/guards/RequireAd: Route guard that checks admin authentication and redirects or displays loading/error states.
frontend/src/components/guards/RequireAu: Authentication guard prompting Internet Identity login and handling login errors before rendering children.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Layout component wrapping pages with a header, footer, and main content area.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Footer displaying a translated copyright message.
frontend/src/components/layout/Header.ts: Top navigation bar with links, language selector, auth‑dependent actions, and mobile menu logic.
frontend/src/components/search/HomeSearc: Search form allowing users to filter by category, location, and availability, then navigate to results.
frontend/src/components/workers/PhotoPic: Image uploader for worker photos with preview, removal, and conversion to ExternalBlob.
frontend/src/components/workers/WorkerCa: Displays a worker’s basic info, photo, location, and a button linking to their profile.
frontend/src/components/workers/WorkerCo: Provides call and WhatsApp contact buttons and triggers a call-start hook.
frontend/src/components/workers/WorkerJo: Renders a list of worker jobs with status badges and details, or an empty state when none exist.
frontend/src/components/workers/WorkerPr: Form for editing an existing worker profile, handling validation, photo updates, and reapproval warnings.
frontend/src/components/workers/WorkerRe: Registration form for new workers including identity integration, photo upload, and profile construction.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminSession.ts: Handles admin login by validating credentials through the actor and storing or clearing admin session data.
frontend/src/hooks/useAuthz.ts: Combines worker identity and admin session state to expose simple authorization flags.
frontend/src/hooks/useI18n.ts: Provides access to the i18n context for translations and language settings.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity authentication, exposing identity, login, logout, and status tracking via context.
frontend/src/hooks/usePostCallAlarm.ts: Tracks call start events in session storage and triggers a timed post-call alarm.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for user profiles, categories, and admin-protected mutations using the backend actor.
frontend/src/i18n/I18nProvider.tsx: Provides a translation context with language persistence and a translate helper.
frontend/src/i18n/index.ts: Implements translation lookup, pluralization, interpolation, and language registry.
frontend/src/i18n/locales/as.ts: Contains Assamese translation strings for UI components and pages.
frontend/src/i18n/locales/en.ts: English locale definitions containing UI text strings for common actions, navigation, pages, and worker-related messaging.
frontend/src/i18n/locales/hi.ts: Hindi locale definitions mirroring the English set, providing translations for UI text, navigation, and worker-related content.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining theme variables, dark mode styles, and component styling including a hero image glow effect.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point initializing React, React Query, Internet Identity provider, and global styles.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboardPage.ts: Admin dashboard page with tabs for managing workers, categories, and inquiries, wrapped in an admin access guard.
frontend/src/pages/AdminLoginPage.tsx: Admin login form handling authentication, error states, and redirecting authenticated users to the dashboard.
frontend/src/pages/CategoriesIndexPage.t: Page displaying the list of service categories using a grid component with introductory text.
frontend/src/pages/CategoryPage.tsx: Category detail page fetching workers by category and showing loading, error, empty, or worker list states.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Landing page showing hero content, search panel, and category grid with navigation actions.
frontend/src/pages/SearchResultsPage.tsx: Displays filtered worker search results with loading, error, and empty states, plus filter controls.
frontend/src/pages/WorkerDashboardPage.t: Worker dashboard for viewing and editing profile, managing jobs, and handling connection or missing-profile states.
Handles login via Internet Identity, user profile setup, worker registration, and connection or login errors.
frontend/src/pages/WorkerProfilePage.tsx: Shows a worker’s public profile with photo, details, pricing, location, and contact actions.
frontend/src/utils/adminApiErrorHandling: Utility for classifying admin API errors and returning messages or redirecting on unauthorized cases.
frontend/src/utils/adminSessionStorage.t: Manages admin session storage including save, retrieve, clear, and active checks.
frontend/src/utils/authDiagnostics.ts: Provides structured logging for authentication events, including attempts, successes, and failures.
frontend/src/utils/categories.ts: Defines category IDs, display names, and maps each category to an icon index and image path.
frontend/src/utils/contactLinks.ts: Provides helpers to normalize phone numbers and generate tel and WhatsApp links.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Implements utilities for getting, storing, and clearing URL and session parameters, including hash-based routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending colors, fonts, animations, and container settings with custom theme variables.
project_state.json: Describes project state, features, and requirements for restricting job completion actions to admin only.
